name: A Quality Shooter
blurb: This project is an Independant Video game. It is a Fun and exciting side scrolling shooter. It needs more Great Music, Artwork and Programming

rewards.reward: GREAT... (1)Name in the credits under The Great in a 14 point font. (2)An award certificate from Sorcery Games signed by the Designer. (3)A PC version of the game. Unprotected so you can give it to your friends. Show them your name in the credits.

SUPER... (1)Name in the credits under The Super in a 15 point font. (2)An award certificate from Sorcery Games signed by the Designer. (3)Name in the Highscore default listing. Everyone will be competing with your score. (4)A PC version of the game. Unprotected so you can give it to your friends. Show them your name in the credits and highscore table.

BRILLIANT... (1)Name in the credits under The Brilliant in a 16 point font. (2)An award certificate from Sorcery Games signed by the Designer. (3)Name in the Highscore default listing. Everyone will be competing with your score. (4)Receive an Exclusive SorceryGames T-shirt. (5)A Special PC version of the game including your name on the Main menu. Unprotected so you can give it to your friends. Show them YOUR game with your name also in the credits and Highscore table.

MEGA... (1)Name in the credits under The Mega in a 17 point font. (2)An award certificate from Sorcery Games signed by the Designer. (3)Name in the Highscore default listing. Everyone will be competing with your score. (4)Receive an Exclusive SorceryGames T-shirt. (5)A Special PC version of the game including your name on the Main menu. Unprotected so you can give it to your friends. Show them YOUR game with your name also in the credits and Highscore table. (6)Receive an Exclusive sorceryGames Black baseball cap.

AWESOME... (1)Name in the credits under The Awesome in an 18 point font. (2)An award certificate from Sorcery Games signed by the Designer. (3)Name in the Highscore default listing. Everyone will be competing with your score. (4)Receive an Exclusive SorceryGames T-shirt. (5)A Special PC version of the game including your name on the Main menu. Unprotected so you can give it to your friends. Show them YOUR game with your name also in the credits and Highscore table.\r\n(6)Receive an Exclusive sorceryGames Black baseball cap.(7)Send us a Picture (age appropriate) of you (or anyone you want) and it will be entered into the actual gameplay of the game.

ASTOUNDING... (1)Name in the credits under The Astounding in an 20 point font. (2)An award certificate from Sorcery Games signed by the Designer. (3)Name in the Highscore default listing. Everyone will be competing with your score. (4)Receive an Exclusive SorceryGames T-shirt. (5)A Super Duper Special PC version of the game. Have some artistic talent or know anyone artistic? You can modify the in game level graphics to be anything you want (some restrictions apply, copyrighted materials etc). This will make the PC version an incredibly personalized version. Unprotected so you can give it to your friends. Show them YOUR game with YOUR art and name in the credits and Highscore table. \r\n(6)Receive an Exclusive sorceryGames Black baseball cap.(7)Send us a Picture (age appropriate) of you (or anyone you want) and it will be entered into the actual gameplay of the game. (8)CD of the in game music and Sorcerygames themed music.
